item.title: Lol i have alot of question if u can answer any plz help =)
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

nbk4life:

ok number one how do i change a lvl need to wear an item?2 how do i add pvp 2 my server like if u walk outside edgeville bank you can att?3 how do i change the price of items in the shop?4 how do i make ppl follow when there atting ??? tyvm if u can help and tyvm if u tryed?

Change the level requirements for an item: Wearing.java

PvP: Search a tutorial if your having trouble, but extend wilderness coordinates in Client.java or create a new range of coordinates and copy the necessary wilderness codes.

Item prices: Item.cfg in the config folder.

Read full topic
